resources.string: The sudo script will be installed to your device. This will modify system files, and is therefore dangerous. It is your responsibility if this messes up your device. This precedure requires that you have root! The status text below will automatically update when the procedure is complete.
We were not able to obtain root access! Are you properly rooted? Did you allow access to Sudo Installer?

Recovery Install will reboot your device to recovery mode, and install the sudo script as an update. This is useful on devices that have system write protection. This requires a custom recovery, such as TWRP or CWM. Your device will be rebooted. Tap/press back to cancel.

You are using Sudo Installer 2.2.2. Version 3.x is now available, but you must install it manually. You may safely remove version 2.2.2 without any data loss after installing version 3.x. Please choose your installation method of choice, or tap/press back to continue using version 2.2.2. Version 3.x brings full support for Android 6.0, systemless root mode, and more! Apoligies for any inconvenience, and thanks for using Sudo Installer.
